text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews We don’t give a shit what you think. Why haven’t you called out your cult members to stop reaking havoc & threatening protesters with guns. 
You’re having your Ego/Hate Rally even though they’ve asked you to postpone it due to the coronavirus cases rising there but you don’t care
